full_summary:
===============

### Solicitation Title

Transport Canada Senior Learning Advisor

### Solicitation Reference

* Reference Number: PW-23-01023923
* Solicitation Number: T8080-220523
* Publication Date: January 30, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 14, 2023, 15:00 ET

### Solicitation Overview

Transport Canada is seeking the services of a Senior Learning Advisor. This solicitation is issued against the Learning Services Supply Arrangement (SA), PWGSC File No. E60ZH-2100LS. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing services related to training design, analysis, and course development.

### Key Requirements

* The successful bidder must have expertise in the design, analysis, and development of training courses.
* The bidder must demonstrate a thorough understanding of adult learning principles and methodologies.
* Fluency in English and French is a requirement.
* The bidder must have access to the necessary resources and talent to deliver on the expected outcomes.

### Solicitation Documents

The solicitation document package is available on the Canada Buy and Sell website:
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/30/05601012d90961245d048a8286bdceac/t8080-220523_-_npp.pdf

### Contact Information

If you have any questions or require clarification on the solicitation, please contact:

 Cory Lajoie
 Contracting Authority
 Transport Canada
 Phone: (204) 228-2267
 Email: cory.lajoie@tc.gc.ca

Note: The Tender Closing Date has expired and the solicitation is no longer active.
